Content.Text:
<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>.
You're in a good mood recently...
<PAGE>
Each day seems brighter when you have
a special someone in your heart, right?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Tee-hee-hee...
I see EVERYTHING, didn't you know?
<PAGE>
Today I, the Harvest Goddess who rules
affairs of the heart, will tell you how
to <RED>confess your love</RED>, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
For a confession of love to succeed, you
need the other person's <RED>affection</RED>
and a <GREEN>ring</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
The person's affection is shown by the
color of the heart displayed when you
talk to them.
<PAGE>
As you get to know them better the
color changes: Gray, purple, blue,
green, yellow, orange, and red.
<PAGE>
Your confession of love has a chance of
success if the heart color is blue or
higher.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you have strong feelings for
someone and want to confess your love,
give them a <GREEN>ring</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
It's the custom around here to give
someone a <GREEN>ring</GREEN> as a way of confessing
your love so you can start dating.
<PAGE>
They sell <GREEN>rings</GREEN> at the <BLUE>General Store</BLUE>.
Keep it in your bag so you don't miss
your chance to make a love confession!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you want someone to make a confession
of love to you, the best approach is to
shower them with gifts!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's about all there is to confessing
your love! I'll be going now!
May you be lucky in love! Toodles!
